ch0020_90_toya/0101_0701_02_10:
If you’re ever looking to test your strength,
I wanna be the first person you call!
ch0020_90_toya/7101_0701_01_10:
Neo Champions are role models for all
sync pairs on Pasio...
ch0020_90_toya/7101_0701_02_10:
I’m gonna keep working hard so everyone’ll
wanna follow my lead!
ch0020_90_toya/7102_0701_01_10:
The hero of legend can fill in the missing
parts of Kyurem’s body with truth and ideals.
ch0020_90_toya/7102_0701_02_10:
People say Kyurem was waiting for someone
like that to come along.
ch0020_90_toya/7102_0701_03_10:
Since it chose me, I plan to do whatever it
takes to meet those expectations!
ch0020_90_toya/7103_0701_01_10:
Champions really help people feel
empowered, don’t they.
ch0020_90_toya/7103_0701_02_10:
That said, since becoming Champion myself,
I’d say when we’re battling, we feel
empowered by everyone else, too.
ch0020_90_toya/7104_0701_01_10:
The freezing energy inside Kyurem is so
powerful, it leaks out of its body.
ch0020_90_toya/7104_0701_02_10:
I can get pretty worked up when battling,
so it actually helps me stay cool!
ch0020_90_toya/7105_0701_01_10:
What are your thoughts on Champions,
[Name:PlayerNickname ]?
ch0020_90_toya/7105_0701_02_10:
I think a real Champion is someone who isn’t
just focused on being number one.
ch0020_90_toya/7105_0701_03_10:
Champions are Champions because they
focus on their hobbies and goals—then
one day, they just realize they’re the best!
ch0020_90_toya/1701_0701_01_10: Oh, perfect timing! I have something for you.
ch0020_90_toya/1701_0702_01_10: I think you’ll find a good use for that.
ch0020_90_toya/2501_0701_01_10:
Ever since I became a Neo Champion,
people have been calling me and N the
Hero in White and the Hero in Black.
ch0020_90_toya/2501_0701_02_10:
It sorta makes me feel like we’re in it
together, y’know?
ch0020_90_toya/2501_0702_01_10:
What do you think of the title “the Hero
in White”?
ch0020_90_toya/2501_0702_02_10:
To tell you the truth...it was a little
embarrassing at first. It’s not really the sort
of name I’d give myself, y’know?
ch0020_90_toya/2501_0702_03_10:
But I do want to meet everyone’s
expectations!
ch0020_90_toya/2511_0701_01_10:
Even though I’ve become a Neo Champion,
I won’t stop challenging myself!
ch0020_90_toya/2511_0701_02_10:
There are so many people I still haven’t
beaten in battle!
ch0020_90_toya/2511_0702_01_10:
Hey, when should we have our next battle?
Today? Tomorrow?
ch0020_90_toya/2511_0702_02_10:
In fact, are you free now? My fighting spirit
is seriously burning!
ch0020_90_toya/3001_0701_01_10:
Look at you, working so hard this morning!
I’ve gotta put in the work too, as a good
role model.
ch0020_90_toya/3003_0701_01_10:
Did you have lunch? Gotta fill your belly
if you’re gonna have intense battles!
ch0020_90_toya/3005_0701_01_10:
Whether you’re on an adventure or training,
save up your energy at night, and let it
explode the next day!
